about_the_game:
-!THIS VN IS STILL IN EARLY ACCESS!-

Welcome to Cyberlinxxx

After the megacorporation's war fallout, the government relinquished control, granting megacorps extraterritorial rights.

This sparked the rise of Megacities, fuelled by advancements like AI, VR, gene editing, food printing, and advanced robotics,
elevating life standards at a cost. In Arriaka's depths, you once manipulated DNA for false identities, served time, and earned a 2nd chance at Plumbella Corp. Your expertise birthed a potential cure for "Morbus Malkov," a coveted breakthrough for megacorporation factions.

Now a target, they'll stop at nothing to seize your creation. But you refuse to surrender without a fight. Because if there's one thing everyone lives by is the mantra "Success is the only thing that matters".

Arriaka can be a dark place, a dangerous and lingering moloch of a city. Yet, there's enough place to slip through the cracks and it can be funny and entertaining as well. Every character you meet there enriches the story and deepens the immersion as the different paths unfold before you.

A big cast of characters from all walks of life awaits you. Decide with which you want to connect. It's all up to you. Some choices can lead to surprising results.

Here, have a look at three of the nine girls you'll meet in Cyberlinxxx

Zandra Bellerose, ex-Mafia guard, gets clean about her past by working a Corpjob at Plumbella Corp. She's curious, observant, and always in the moment. Zandra needs some help for a certain condition she carries. Maybe you can help her?

CT-KLT 2098 aka A-Z is your loyal female droid companion. Built for deep space operations, exploration, and ... household activities. She's always been by your side since she came with the house you bought before starting at Plumbella. A-Z is kind and sweet but can be ferocious and direct. Her production line was decomissioned by the state authorities after a droid uprising in the Mars asteroid belt but somehow managed to slip through the cracks. Lucky for you, no one in Arriaka gives a shit about gov law.

Trish Walker. At first, the secretary seems like a typical adrenaline junkie, always searching for the next big thrill. It's a side of her that seems contradicted by her normal wage job at Plumbella. She's hungry for life and even was a winner in the Memphidrome's droid fights 2 years ago. And she never backs down on a challenge.

Do you want a cyberpunk theme-inspired visual novel? You got it.
Do you want story and character development? You got it.
Do you want the visuals to support all that? You got it.

Features

  • 2400 renders up until now with more coming

  • 9 girls to meet

  • Expanded music tracks. Ranging from Synthwave to hardbass.

  • Different routes and choices

Coming up

  • Gallery

  • Scene replay gallery

  • Steam achievements

Gameloop

This game is an adult visual novel. Comparable to an interactive book or choose your adventure games. Many types of choices await you. Some will affect with which girl you want to engage with. You can choose your favorite girl, no forced choices here. Other choices impact the game itself i.e. weapon mods for your droid and so on.

content_descriptors.notes: Your choices can lead to nudity and/or sexual content suitable for 18+ adults. And sometimes violence in form of melee fights, hand to hand combat, car chases and other fight scenes. There will be Sex, blood and explosions!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Skylake, Ryzen Am4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Ryzen AM4, Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra
  • Processor: Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ventura
  • Processor: Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Cyberlinxxx

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 8
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Sexo Explícito
Violência Extrema
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Experience the thrills of a cyberpunk adventure with a cast of sexy and strong women. Dive into the shadows of the Megacity Arriaka and find out who wanted to kill you.
